0.0.1.name: wordpress/your-text-manager
0.0.1.description:
This plugin alows you to set text or code to display before or after each post, without changing the post content.

features: * easy interface and simple settings page

  • option to display the text before the content of the post, after the content or before and after the post

  • any type of client-side code: HTML, Javascript, embed of video or enything you want

  • great plugin for ads: display banner of google adsense on thwe website

example:

title and details(as your theme) YOUR TEXT

the post content the post content the post content the post content the post content the post content

YOUR TEXT

you can also set a message for all your users, in the main dashboard.

new! you can set a message for all your visitors, as a widget.
